Baseline.name: baseline
Baseline.selection: MET>=250 and MT>=150 and Njets>=2 and DPhi_jmet>=0.5 and trigger and passFilters() and passGoodVtx() and tmod>-1000 and Mlb()>=0

Region.name: CR2l
Region.selection: lep1_pt>20.0 and lep2_pt>10.0 and lep1_MiniIso!>0.1 and lep2_MiniIso!>0.1 and dilepSel() and Nbjets>=1 and TrackVeto and TauVeto

Region.name: CR0b
Region.selection: Nbjets==0 and NLeps==1 and NVLeps==1 and TrackVeto and TauVeto

Bin.name: _A_
Bin.label: _A_
Bin.selection: Njets!>=3 and tmod>=10 and Mlb()!>=175 and DPhi_jmet>=0.8

Bin.name: _B_
Bin.label: _B_
Bin.selection: Njets!>=3 and tmod>=10 and Mlb()>175 and DPhi_jmet>=0.8 and tightCSVV2()

Bin.name: _C_
Bin.label: _C_
Bin.selection: Njets>=4 and tmod!>=0 and Mlb()!>=175 and DPhi_jmet>=0.8

Bin.name: _D_
Bin.label: _D_
Bin.selection: Njets>=4 and tmod!>=0 and Mlb()>175 and DPhi_jmet>=0.8 and tightCSVV2()

Bin.name: _E_
Bin.label: _E_
Bin.selection: Njets>=4 and tmod>0 and tmod!>=10 and Mlb()!>=175 and DPhi_jmet>=0.8

Bin.name: _F_
Bin.label: _F_
Bin.selection: Njets>=4 and tmod>0 and tmod!>=10 and Mlb()>175 and DPhi_jmet>=0.8 and tightCSVV2()

Bin.name: _G_
Bin.label: _G_
Bin.selection: Njets>=4 and tmod>=10 and Mlb()!>=175 and DPhi_jmet>=0.8

Bin.name: _H_
Bin.label: _H_
Bin.selection: Njets>=4 and tmod>=10 and Mlb()>175 and DPhi_jmet>=0.8 and tightCSVV2()

Bin.name: _I_
Bin.label: _I_
Bin.selection: Njets>=5 and lep1_pt!>150 and dphiML!>2 and passMEDbtag->at(0) == false
